About Me

Hi, my name’s Andrea and I’m a iOS developer. As well as creating apps from the ground up I also have experience making software and web apps.

Experience

Zero12

iOS Developer

January 2020 - Present

zero12.it

  • Brand sustainability

    The app displays products lists and details regarding the product’s sustainability of the brand. Implemented SSO authentication to display additional data and let the user participate in sustainability quizzes. Also implemented custom animated charts.

  • IoT stove control

    The app can remotely control and monitor multiple stoves using BLE and MQTT. Heavy use of Modbus communication protocol and RxSwift.

  • Joint position based photo shooting

    The app can recognize body positions in real-time and take pictures based on the user joints configuration.
